<?php
/*
Plugin Name: Remove widgets
Description: Remove default widgets
Version: 1.0
Author: Anonform Ab
*/

remove_action('init', 'wp_widgets_init', 1);
add_action('init', function() { do_action('widgets_init'); }, 1);
add_action('wp_head', 'anon_custom_styles', 100);
function anon_custom_styles(){
echo '<style>#archives,#meta,#branding img { display: none; }</style>';
}

<?php
require '/wordpress/wp-load.php';

$posts = get_posts(array(
'numberposts'=>-1,
'post_type'=>array('post', 'page'),
'post_status'=>'any'
));

foreach($posts as $post){
wp_delete_post($post->ID, true);
}
